mapper.select: SELECT /* MPEPartsCompanyMapper.selectPartsCompanyDtl */ A.BSNM_NO , A.CMPN_NM , A.RPRSNT_NM , A.CMPN_NFRML_NM , A.CMPN_CD , A.CTGRY_CD , A.SIZE_CD , A.STBSM_DT , A.TEL_NO , A.ZIPCODE , A.BSC_ADDR , A.DTL_ADDR , A.SLS_PMT , A.SLS_YEAR , A.MPLE_CNT , A.MJR_PRDCT_1 , A.MJR_PRDCT_2 , A.MJR_PRDCT_3 , A.QLTY_5_STAR_CD , A.QLTY_5_STAR_YEAR , A.PAY_5_STAR_CD , A.PAY_5_STAR_YEAR , A.TCHLG_5_STAR_CD , A.TCHLG_5_STAR_YEAR , A.ADM_MEMO , A.REG_ID , A.REG_IP , A.REG_DTM , B.cbsn_seq , B.nm , B.score , B.year , B.crtfn_cmpn_nm FROM cp_cmpn_mst A LEFT JOIN cp_cmpn_cbsn_dtl B ON A.bsnm_no = B.bsnm_no WHERE 1=1 AND A.BSNM_NO = #{bsnmNo}
SELECT /* MPEPartsCompanyMapper.checkBsnmNo */ BSNM_NO , CMPN_NM , RPRSNT_NM FROM CP_CMPN_MST WHERE BSNM_NO = #{bsnmNo}

SELECT /* MPEPartsCompanyMapper.selectEduCnt */ COUNT(A.EDCTN_SEQ) FROM ( SELECT EDCTN_SEQ , EPISD_YEAR , EPISD_ORD FROM ED_EDCTN_EPISD_MST )A INNER JOIN ( SELECT EDCTN_SEQ , EPISD_YEAR , EPISD_ORD , ISTTR_SEQ FROM ED_EDCTN_ISTTR_REL )B ON A.EDCTN_SEQ = B.EDCTN_SEQ AND A.EPISD_YEAR = B.EPISD_YEAR AND A.EPISD_ORD = B.EPISD_ORD INNER JOIN ( SELECT ISTTR_SEQ , FFLTN_NM FROM CP_ISTTR_MST )C ON B.ISTTR_SEQ = C.ISTTR_SEQ AND C.FFLTN_NM = #{cmpnNm}
SELECT /* MPEPartsCompanyMapper.selectConsultingCnt */ COUNT(CNSTG_SEQ) FROM CP_CNSTG_APPCTN_MST WHERE APPCTN_BSNM_NO = #{bsnmNo}

SELECT COUNT(A.EPISD_SEQ) FROM ( SELECT EPISD_SEQ FROM CX_EPISD_MST )A INNER JOIN ( SELECT APPCTN_SEQ , EPISD_SEQ , APPCTN_BSNM_NO FROM CX_APPCTN_MST )B ON A.EPISD_SEQ = B.EPISD_SEQ AND B.APPCTN_BSNM_NO = #{bsnmNo}
